channel.title: Little spec bar problem
channel.description:
Well when i Activate the spec in some weapons like Godswords the spec bar looks like this
[IMG]http://img157.imageshack.us/img157/9852/lookeg9.jpg[/img]
Whats wrong with it ? :(
i want it to look like this
[IMG]http://img209.imageshack.us/img209/4208/look2sf8.jpg[/img]
But the problem is only on Godswords.
Any one a little advice?
